name: Asameshimae Nyanko
overview: Breakfast Island. This is a peaceful dream island where lots of kittycats live... However, lately Crimson cat and Blue cat have begun bickering about many things, and it's becoming serious! "Don't enter my territory!" "Your territory?! It's my territory!" The decision was made to mark the territory by playing a simple game. The rules are simple, be like a cat and fight like a cat for each turn. Now cheer for the kitty cats and restore peace and order to Breakfast Island so there are no more conflicts!
